name: Ultimate Searchable Accordion Lite – WPBakery Page Builder Addon
author: xenioushk

sections.description:
Live Demo | Video Tutorials | User Guide | Pro Version

It’s very easy to use. It comes with attractive responsive layout that can fit any kind of screen which gives the best user experience of your users. This addon provide you a great option to create responsive and animated accordions for your website.

Plugin Features:

  • Unlimited and multiple accordions in a single page.
  • Quick installation and super easy to use.
  • Smooth jQuery & CSS3 based Accordion.
  • Responsive Accordion.
  • 14+ Smooth Animation & Effects.
  • 6 Stylish Predefined Accordion Theme.
  • Less file included for easy CSS customization.
  • Font Awesome.
  • Google Fonts.
  • Retina Ready.
  • RTL Supported.
  • Compatible with latest WordPress & WPBakery Page Builder Plugin.
  • Cross Browser Supported.
  • Valid & Well Commented Markup.

Pro Version Features:

  • Accordion content search option to find answers easily.
  • Search suggestion box.
  • Pagination feature for large accordion list.
  • Premium Six months support & Lifetime Upgrade.
  • Extensive Documentation.

Get The Pro Version
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ultimate-searchable-accordion-lite-wpbakery-page-builder-addon/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Advaced FAQ->Add FAQ to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Does search box work in mobile device?

Yes, plugin search box support and work pretty well in mobile devices. Search box has clear ( X ) button, so you can easily clear search field text with out pressing back button of your phone.

Is it possible to open multiple (or all) sections at once?

Yes, it is possible.

short_description: Ultimate Searchable Accordion is the most powerful and advanced content searchable accordion addon for WPBakery Page Builder.
